channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Avamar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Avamar

item.title: CVE-2021-21511|2024-08-03T18:16:22.627Z -- dell -- avamar
item.description: Dell EMC Avamar Server, versions 19.3 and 19.4 contain an Improper Authorization vulnerability in the web UI. A remote low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, to gain unauthorized read or modification access to other users' backup data.
